“My To

“To VICTOR VICTOR Victor VICTOR FRANKENSTEIN.

“MY FRANKENSTEIN.

“MY Fankenstein MayFeb. 18 – 17— My FRANKENSTEIN.

“MY DEAREST DEAR dear dearest DEAREST FRIEND,

“It FRIEND,

“It Friend,

“It Friend.It FRIEND,
